projects.title: Decentralized Finance
projects.description: Including the study of cryptocurrency, decentralized applications, distributed ledgers, blockchains, smart contracts, digital wallets, blockchain oracles, decentralized exchanges, banks, thrifts and mortgage finance, diversified financial services, consumer finance, capital markets and mortgage real estate investment trusts

projects.title: Web Development 3.0
projects.description: Including the study of coding, cryptography, communications, blockchains, open-source software, software as a service (SaaS), content management, user interfaces, client-side scripting, server-side scripting, network connectivity, network security, web mail, e-commerce, progressive web applications, short-term memory, long-term memory, storage and cloud services

projects.title: Data Science
projects.description: Including the study of statistical methods, insights engines, decision management, disparate data, descriptive, predictive, and prescriptive analytics, target market selection, new product introductions, customer retention, pricing, segmentation, promotion, data warehouses, data lakes, cloud computing, machine learning and artifical intelligence
